dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2643 : State Licensing Efficiency Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To direct the Attorney General to provide State officials with access to criminal history information with respect to certain financial service providers required to undergo State criminal background checks, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the State Licensing Efficiency Act of 2015.
Section 1511(a) of the S.A.F.E. Mortgage Licensing Act of 2008 (12 U.S.C. 5110(a)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by inserting after State-licensed loan originators the following: and other financial service providers; and
by inserting before the period the following: or other financial service providers.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives October 28, 2015.
